title: mystery gift didnt work?
body: so i got my 10 year mystery gift but it disappeared and i got nothing? i checked to see if i got the kayle skin but nope any ideas or has this happened to anyone else?

replies.body:
From the _Thank You_ Article:

>Due to the nature of this particular gift and the way it varies by account, we’re not able to simultaneously grant it to everyone. This means it may take a few days for the gift to show on your account. We’re asking for a bit of patience through next week as we pick up all the stragglers—if you don’t have it by 24/09, let Player Support know. Additionally, players using the alpha League client may receive the gift but not a notice—double-check your account before opening a ticket. 

Rito Santa's got a lotta houses to deliver to but he'll get to yours eventually ; )
Same thing happened to me. Icon but no skin, I have Riot Kayle from PAX, but I wouldn't worry yet. There are a lot of people to give gifts too.
i got the icon but no skin. They said it can take up to a week for everything, so i wouldn't worry about missing out until next Wednesday or so.
same same got icon, no skin
i got kayle (which i own). on my other acc i got the icon so i assume they're 3 separate gifts and they'll come one at a time. Takes up to 3 days according to riot
I get the Icon, but not the skin?
I have the Kayle skin but I haven't recieved the gift yet, but I did get the icon whcih is weird, unless RIot's shipping out the gifts separately
Same problem here, maybe it's just a bug and you have to wait for it to register in? Idk
